"Mags":
"Mags provide support in a variety of ways, such as parameter boosting, battle support, Photon Blasts, item creation etc.

As your Mag grows, your character's power also grows."

"Your equipped Mag's parameters are added to your character's parameters, allowing you to strengthen your character.

Your Mag has \"energy\", which decreases over time and when it performs support actions."

"Feeding items to your Mag causes it to grow. Your Mag's abilities develop differently depending on the items you give it.
Striking weapons: Striking support is likely to increase
Shooting weapons: Shooting support is likely to increase
Teching weapons: Teching support is likely to increase

When a Mag reaches a certain level, it evolves into a new form.

â€»Mags can only be fed when their energy has decreased."

"Mags have Auto Actions and Trigger Actions.

These can have various effects, such as automatically attacking the enemy, or providing recovery for players."

"You can also customize the appearance and abilities of your Mag using Mag Devices.

Mag Evolution Devices can only be used on Mags above level 100.

Earn a Mag License and raise your Mag to be your partner on your adventures."
